revision.text: Possibly: An introduction to merchandise Containing a complete system of arithmetic. A system of algebra. Forms and manner of transacting bills of exchange. Book-keeping in various forms. An account of the trade of Great Britain, and the laws and practices relating to sale, factorage, insurance, shipping, &c..., by Robert Hamilton. (Edinburgh, C. Elliot; London, C. Elliot, T. Kay and Co., 1788). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/671860854
